headline: Vertex Pharmaceuticals: The Cost Of Growing Beyond Cystic Fibrosis (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals is anchored by cystic fibrosis as launches lag, JOURNAVX and CASGEVY add little revenue, and growth is modest. Read why VRTX stock is a hold.
